name: Rollin free
description:
Our first game, its really early in alpha so there is not very much in it and might be some bugs. We will work on the game. Tell us what you want to be in the game and we might put it in. Also report any bugs you encounter.

This was just a little project but i think we can make it bigger!

Update Notes:

  • Added Health bar
  • Added Health pickups
  •  fixed a lot of bugs
